name: BusTrackDC
body:
**Do you live in or near Washington, DC and ride the bus? This app is for you!**

Find the nearest bus stops, when the next bus is arriving, and where each route will take you, all in real time thanks to WMATA's data feeds.

I take the bus to work and I made this app after my favorite bus app stopped working earlier this year. I hope you find it as useful as I do!

This software is free and open source -- if you encounter any problems or bugs, or if you want to help me make this app better, go to https://github.com/j-ro/WheresTheBusDC
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: An iOS app to find out when your bus is coming to a stop near you, using WMATA prediction data.
